value.desc: There are a variety of ways to use JavaScript to obtain the value of the selected option in a select list or a reference to the selected option:  Use the value property of the select list. Use the selectedIndex property. Loop through the options and determine which one is selected and return either its value or a reference.

The value property of a select box comes from the value attribute of the selected option or the first selected option in a select-multiple type select box. So the value of the selected option can be obtained in JavaScript as follows
